item.title: CVE-2024-27962|2024-08-02T00:41:56.037Z -- florian%20%27fkrauthan%27%20krauthan -- wp-mpdf
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Florian 'fkrauthan' Krauthan allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects wp-mpdf: from n/a through 3.7.1.
